TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UidPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UidPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UidPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指出提供 [x:Uid 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-uid-directive.md)值之類別的 CLR 屬性。

span.span: Indicates the CLR property of a class that provides the [x:Uid Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-uid-directive.md) value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，讓它們可以識別為唯一識別在標記中的項目節點的 XAML 語言屬性。The is a XAML language attribute that identifies element nodes in markup so that they can be uniquely identified. 雖然模型`x:Uid`可能更為廣泛，一個 XAML 項目的唯一識別項的使用方式為當地語系化工具，使 XAML 需要當地語系化的語言元件可以產生附屬當地語系化來源，然後重新在原始 XAML 與整合。Although the model for `x:Uid` is potentially more general, one usage of unique identifiers for XAML elements is for localization tools, so that XAML language components that need localization can generate a companion localization source and then re-integrated with the original XAML. 如需有關如何`x:Uid`用於 WPF 當地語系化。For more information on how `x:Uid` is used in WPF localization. 請參閱[WPF 全球化和當地語系化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md)。see [WPF Globalization and Localization Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
